title: helping team
body: in game support are actually very good, some time people said that support are bad they not even can get kill but without support adc is useless and now some people are understand and starting play support more then normal. and now and for after and forever support will alway in league of legend. my roll is support XD (notice me senpai){{champion:37}}

replies.body:
This probably doesn't belong on this board, but I can understand why it's here. "Help & Support".

You shine on, crazy diamond.
